title: Woman with Veil, San Francisco
marks:
Signature, Inscription, Edition and Stamp

ULC o on back, in pencil: [Lisette Model]
description: seated older woman wearing a flower hat with a net veil covering her face, a ruffled lace blouse and a floral corsage; woman is holding a pair of white gloves and a clutch purse with a fur coat draped over her arm
creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
